question: Which railway station has become the 5500th station of India to get free wifi facility?
explanation: Jharkhand\'s Mahuamilan railway station has become the latest among these to get the facility. Mahuamilan station becomes the countryâ€™s 5500th station to get free wifi facility. Free Wi-Fi service to passengers are being provided under RailWire. The Railways began the service of providing free WiFi at their stations from January 2016 from the Mumbai Central station.
